content.prompt: What is said about hanami ?

choices.label: Sweets and green tea are enjoyed by event-goers.
It is old-fashioned and losing popularity.
Light pollution makes the event less enjoyable.
It is a spring event that started in the Nara period.

unit.text: 5: Factors That Impact the Quality of Life

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Make connections among cultural and interdisciplinary information provided in texts.
